artist: Artist: Nikolas Piskariov; Author: Leo Tolstoy; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club; Printer: Goznak Press, Moscow
description: binding: full Russian calico, gold stamped lettering and designs, partly over red; endpapers: white wove printed in green to form lace designs; slipcase: beige paper over cardboard, printed label affixed; type: Monotype Elzevir; 932 pp.; 2 volumes
title: Anna Karenina
